law.catch_line: Billing of third party by vendor for medical services.
law.text: Prior to billing the Kentucky Medical Assistance Program, all participating vendors shall submit billings for medical services first to a third party when such vendor has knowledge that such third party may be liable for payment of the services.
law.history: Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 252, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1980.
